parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

parameters.name: Endpoint
parameters.description:
Specifies the database to which the password belongs. Valid values:

*   **src**: source database
*   **dest**: destination database

>  This parameter must be specified.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description:
The new password of the account.

>  This parameter must be specified and cannot be the same as the current password.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the DTS instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: UserName
parameters.description:
The account of the source or destination database.

>  This parameter must be specified.
